meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a law.
meanings.sent1: The predictable pattern of the stars is lawlike.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed a lawlike behavior in the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent3: It was quite amusing to see the lawlike nature of the ants' marching formation.
meanings.sent4: The lawlike regularity of the tides reminded her of the clockwork precision of a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The lawlike relationship between pressure and volume in gases is a fundamental concept in physics.
